items.title: McDonald’s makes massive change for the summer season
items.description: The fast-food giant reveals big plans that will unfold this summer.

items.title: American Eagle Pulls 2025 Outlook After Weak First Quarter
items.description: (Bloomberg) -- American Eagle Outfitters Inc. pulled its guidance for the full year following a first quarter that was marred by discounting and a write-down of inventory, sending the stock down in New York trading. items.description: McDonald's Corporation ( NYSE:MCD ) just released its latest quarterly report and things are not looking great...

items.title: McDonald's India operator doubles quarterly profit as budget menu draws more diners
items.description: The restaurant operator's consolidated profit after tax rose to 15.2 million rupees ($178,163.28) for the quarter ended March 31, from 7.6 million rupees a year ago.  Indian operators of U.S. chains such as KFC and Burger King have launched cheaper items, including a $1 pizza and burger, to compete with local rivals as consumers grapple with high costs of living.  However, the results are in contrast to Pizza Hut franchisee Sapphire Foods .

items.title: McDonald's India operator posts higher quarterly profit as cheaper menu draws consumers
items.description: Westlife Foodworld, theoperator of McDonald's in parts of India, reported ajump in fourth-quarter profit on Wednesday, as its cheaper menuitems attracted budget-conscious consumers. ...
